# Hari Priya Fahen Designing - Next.js Project

This is a Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint configuration.

## Project Structure
- Built with Next.js 16.0.0 and React 19.2.0
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- ESLint for code quality
- App Router architecture

## Available Scripts
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow Tailwind CSS utility-first approach
- Components should be placed in appropriate directories
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
